caseTitle: Muhammad Akram (decd.) thr. LRs. v. Mst. Noor Begum (decd.) thr. LRs. & others
tagline: The proviso to section 42 of the Specific Relief Act, 1877 contemplates that no court shall make any declaration where the plaintiff, being able to seek further relief than a mere declaration of title, omits to do so.
